HKQuery  predicateForMedicationDoseEvent(statuses:) Type MethodpredicateForMedicationDoseEvent(statuses:)iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+class func predicateForMedicationDoseEvent(statuses: Set<NSNumber>) -> NSPredicate Parameters statusesThe logged statuses of the medication dose event to match.

Creates a predicate for use with HKQuery subclasses.

Creates a query predicate that matches HKMedicationDoseEvent samples that have any of the statuses specified.

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuery/predicateForMedicationDoseEvent(statuses:)#parameters)
